description.value:
When you reach a Sorcerer level specified in the Arcana Domain Spells table, you thereafter always have the listed spells prepared.

Arcana Domain Spells
Sorcerer LevelSpells
3@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcanistsM]{Arcanist's Magic Aura}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDetectMagi]{Detect Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMagicMissi]{Magic Missile}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplSilence000]{Silence}
5@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplDispelMagi]{Dispel Magic}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplMagicCircl]{Magic Circle}
7@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplArcaneEye0]{Arcane Eye}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplResilientS]{Resilient Sphere}
9@UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTelekinesi]{Telekinesis}, @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.spells.Item.matSplTeleportat]{Teleportation Circle}
